trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl" /> class is used with an LDAP search function to specify the server used to verify the existence of an object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl" /> 클래스는 개체가 있는지 확인하는 데 사용되는 서버를 지정하기 위해 LDAP 검색 함수와 함께 사용됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl" /> class.
The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl" /> class.
The global catalog the performs the validation.

The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl.#ctor(System.String)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl" /> class using the specified server name.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl.#ctor(System.String)" /> 생성자는 지정된 서버 이름을 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl" /> 클래스의 인스턴스를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: The global catalog that performs the validation.
The flags used for the validation.

The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl" /> class using the specified server name and flags.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32)" /> 생성자는 지정된 서버 이름과 플래그를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl" /> 클래스의 인스턴스를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl.Flag" /> property contains the flag used for validation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl.Flag" /> 속성에는 유효성 검사에 사용되는 플래그가 포함되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl.GetValue" /> method returns the name of the validation server.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl.GetValue" /> 메서드는 유효성 검사 서버의 이름을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of the validation server.
The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl.ServerName" /> property contains the name of the server that performs the validation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VerifyNameControl.ServerName" /> 속성에는 유효성 검사를 수행하는 서버의 이름이 포함되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of the server that performs the validation.
